debtor.label: 1.1 Has the applicant, it's owners, members, or any related company ever had a debtor related proceeding?

acquisitions.label: 1.2 Have there been any acquisitions, consolidations, dissolutions, and/or mergers?

share_comingle_employees.label: 1.3 Does the applicant share or otherwise comingle employees?

successor.label: 1.4 Is the applicant a successor of any other business?

managed_by_another_party.label: 1.5 Is the applicant controlled, owned, or otherwise managed by another party?

client_work.label: 1.6 Is more than 50% of the applicantâ€™s work performed for any one client?

ops_states.label: 1.7 What states do you operate in?

subs_coverage_gl.label: 2.2.1 Do you require subs to carry the General Liability coverage?

subs_coverage_cpl.label: 2.2.2 Do you require subs to carry the Contractors Pollution Liability coverage?

subs_coverage_pl.label: 2.2.3 Do you require subs to carry the Professional Liability coverage?

hold_harmless.label: 2.3 Hold Harmless, Indemnification, and Additional Insured status

ongoing_completed_ops.label: Ongoing and completed operations Additional Insured

non_contributrory_waiver_subrogation.label: Primary non-contributrory and waiver of subrogation?

policy_review.label: 2.4 Do you review your subs entire policies for coverage issues?
policy_review.help: If Yes, who reviews the subcontractor's policy?

temporary_labor.label: 2.5 Do you ever use temporary labor, pay individuals on a 1099 basis or through a staffing agency?

employees_pt.label: 2.6.1 How many Part Time employees do you have?

employees_ft.label: 2.6.2 How many Full Time employees do you have?

annual_turnover.label: 2.6.3 What is your Annual Employee Turnover rate (%)

written_contract.label: 3.1 Do you always use a written contract, for all work 100% of the time?

written_contract_answer.label: 3.2 Please Select Who Typically Drafts This Contract

corporate_counsel_contract_review.label: 3.3 Does the applicant have corporate counsel review contracts?

work_at_airports.label: 3.5 Does the applicant work at airports?

hazard_analysis.label: 3.6 Do you conduct a job hazard analysis on all projects before you begin?

legal_involvement.label: 4.1 Has the applicant, or any of its principals, partners, officers, directors, or affiliated entities, ever been involved in any claim, suit, or legal proceeding - whether resolved or pending - that is related in any way to the type of coverage being applied for or to any operations of the business?

legal_involvement_example.label: 4.2 If yes, please provide full details including date, nature of the claim or proceeding, parties involved, resolution or current status, and any insurance coverage or payments applicable:

rejected_during_prior_three_years.label: 4.3 Has any policy or coverage been declined, cancelled or non-renewed during the prior 3 years?

incident_awareness.label: 4.4 Is the applicant aware of any circumstances which may result in any claim, suit, or notice of incident against the applicant, the predecessors in business, any of the present or past partners or officers, or any staff member, or has any claim, suit, or notice of incident been made against the applicant, any officer, or any staff member?
